name: Pan (Horizontal Rotation)
description: Horizontal camera rotation on fixed axis, revealing space or following action

prompt.base: Panning camera movement, horizontal rotation, camera sweeping left to right or right to left, fixed axis rotation, revealing horizontal space, following action horizontally, smooth pan
prompt.positive: panning shot, horizontal camera movement, smooth rotation, sweeping motion, left to right pan, right to left pan, horizontal reveal, following action, smooth sweep, panoramic movement
prompt.negative: static camera, vertical movement, tilting, tracking, dolly movement, no camera movement, fixed frame

technical.speed: Slow to medium for smooth reveal
technical.use_cases: Revealing landscapes, following moving subjects, establishing wide spaces

examples: Camera panning across a cityscape, smooth horizontal movement revealing the urban landscape
Following a character walking, camera panning to keep them in frame, smooth horizontal tracking
